title: Spacious Light Studio near Beach
posting_body: Large, clean, light-filled, furnished, studio, 500 square feet, in quiet Rio Del Mar. 5 min.
There is cable installed but WiFi is not included.
Please reply with a personalized email if interested.
Perfect for single person or adult couple.
Windows: screens, open easily for air flow and blinds for privacy/darkness
Heating: Adjustable gas wall heater with thermostat
Lighting: Adjustable dimmer lights, standing lamp, table lamp

Kitchen: Tile counters, multiple cabinets, full-sized 4-burner gas stovetop, microwave, full-size fridge, dishwasher, toaster oven, coffee grinder, electric kettle, stainless steel pots and pans, dishes, flatware, cutlery, dish drainer, cutting boards, spices etc.
Bathroom: Shower, vanity, medicine-cabinet, mirror, lights, fan, heater, linen closet, skylight, cotton towels, bathmat
Bedroom area: Double bed with headboard, cotton linens, hypoallergenic quilt, cotton duvet cover, bedside tables, large dresser, double-sized bedroom closet
Other Furniture: Oak kitchen table and four chairs, cushioned chair, book shelf, standing lamp, table lamp, other small tables, wool area rugs
Wireless access for movies and TV can be accessed through your laptop, if desired.
$2,050 for a couple; $1,850 for a single.
